mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ST_WITH_BOARD VALUES ((SELECT MAX(BOARD_NUM) + 1 FROM ST_WITH_BOARD), #{WHID_BOARD_WRITER}, #{WHID_BOARD_TITLE}, #{WHID_BOARD_CONTENT}, #{WHID_BOARD_WRITER}, 1, #{WHID_BOARD_APPLY_NO}, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ST_WITH_BOARD ORDER BY WITH_BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM ST_WITH_BOARD_SUB ORDER BY WITH_BOARD_NO DESC
